track.name: Shirly Lou
comments: made his own guitfiddle. i think it only has a few strings! very cool thanks steve!!!
I'll give you a dollar, Steve!
Seasick Steve is the polar opposite of every mainstream music act in the world and a total breath of fresh air in an otherwise cynical music scene.
Seeing this great man in Manchester tonight, just a few hours to go. Mad for it!!
Heard him on Jools Holland and liked him ever since........
Keeping the blues alive. If you not seen Seasick Steve live you NEED TO.
There is such an earnest quality to his music. Solemn, lonesome, real.

Wide appreciation may have come late for this guy but his laid back talent and clever use of PR has clicked... Congratulations to him... Damn it he even sounds authentic 'old style' blues not a polished up pretence.
just recently discovered him. ah, what a treat!!
